rules: Use Manrope for all section headers and metric labels.
Use JetBrains Mono for ALL numerical data (prices, PnL, timestamps) and log outputs.
Use IBM Plex Sans for general UI text and settings descriptions.
Labels must be uppercase and small: text-[10px] uppercase tracking-wider text-gray-500 font-bold.

structure: Top Bar: Global Status (Bot State, Market Status, Connection) + Theme Toggle
- Left Col (3 cols): Live Position Panel (PnL, SL) + Controls
- Mid Col (6 cols): Nifty Spot Chart/Tracker + Trades Table
- Right Col (3 cols): Daily Summary + Logs + Settings

style_guide.buttons: font-medium text-sm h-9 px-4 rounded-sm transition-all active:scale-95
style_guide.inputs: h-9 rounded-sm border-gray-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 focus:border-blue-500

specifics.cards: bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-sm p-0 overflow-hidden
specifics.card_header: px-4 py-3 border-b border-gray-100 bg-gray-50/50 flex justify-between items-center
specifics.table_header: bg-gray-50 text-xs uppercase text-gray-500 font-semibold tracking-wider
specifics.logs_container: font-mono text-xs bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-sm h-[300px] overflow-y-auto p-2

micro_interactions: Live data updates must flash background color (green/red) briefly.
Buttons must have active state scale reduction.
decorations: Avoid drop shadows. Use borders for separation.
Use subtle striped backgrounds for charts or empty states.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install lucide-react recharts clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-switch @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-scroll-area
SETUP FONTS: Add Manrope, IBM Plex Sans, and JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS import.
THEME ENFORCEMENT: Force LIGHT MODE by default. Do not rely on system preference. Hardcode 'light' class in html/body if needed, but allow toggle.
LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid Mode B'. Use CSS Grid. Ensure the dashboard fills the screen height (h-screen) with internal scrolling for panels.
DATA VISUALIZATION: Use Recharts for the Nifty Spot tracker. Keep it minimal - sparklines or simple area charts. No complex heavy charts.
LOGS: The logs viewer must auto-scroll to bottom. Use a monospace font.
API CREDENTIALS: The 'Update Dhan Token' feature should be a secure input in a Settings Dialog or a dedicated card. Mask the token by default.
STATE INDICATORS: Use a 'pulsing' dot for the Live Bot Status (Green = Running, Gray = Stopped).
TESTING: Add data-testid to all buttons (start-bot-btn, stop-bot-btn) and key metric displays (total-pnl, nifty-ltp).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
Ensure high contrast for all text (WCAG AA).
No generic 'Inter' font. Use the specified font stack.
